title: Advanced Dreams - Islands Of Memory (2014) FLAC+MP3
description:
Artist: Advanced Dreams

Title Of Album: Islands Of Memory

Date Of Release: 8 jan 2014

Label: Lantern / LANT015

Genre: Dub Techno, Ambient

Format Quality: FLAC, MP3 320 kbpsK

Total Time: 01:18:48

Total Size: 583 Mb



Tracklist:

1. Morphia (16:53)

2. Only Nature (11:29)

3. 2am (08:42)

4. Leaving Islands of Memory (08:58)

5. Blue Night (19:56)

6. Blur Flower (12:50)


    Advanced Dreams is a Russian techno duo formed in 2005 by Alexander Shirokov (snow) and Dmitry Bodunov (np). Islands of Memory is their 1st full album following their digital releases from Dewtone Recordings (CAN) and Kahvi Collective (UK), comprising 78 minutes of deep sinking beats and drifting beautiful melodies like cold melting graciers. All of the tracks are carefully produced experimenting with synthesis of various trends of electronic music. As you listen through the tracks, you will feel this pleasurous energy gradually covering up your body and senses.
